bibl.title: The Red Sea from Byzantium to the Caliphate. AD 500-1000
bibl.publisher: The American University in Cairo Press
bibl.note: D.Phil. Diss., Univ. of Oxford, 2010. - Introduction: The Context of Study. - The Late Roman Erythra Thalassa (c. 325-525). - Contestation and Conquests (c. 525-685). - Consolidation and the Caliphate (c. 685-830). - The Early Islamic Bahr al-Qulzum (c. 830-970). - Conclusion: 'The Fall of Rome and Rise of Islam'. - Gazetteer. Bibliography.
bibl.seg: Timothy Power, The Red Sea from Byzantium to the Caliphate. AD 500-1000.
Cairo, The American University in Cairo Press, 2012, 384 pp., 8 cartes. ISBN 978-977-416-544-3. $39.95.

D.Phil.
